data.text: @BDUTT @htTweets @VinayakD @mullickjamie Congratulations Barkha these stories need to be told ...keep up the amazing work .

@BDUTT @htTweets @VinayakD @mullickjamie Hahaaaahaaaahaaa... #NiraRadiaScamster @BDUTT High Hopes You need to gift your Book to your Types by using the Money which you Earned during Nira Radia Tapes SCAM .. Even your Types are not gonna Buy your Book which has Fake Numbers of COVID #TadkaDutt
@BDUTT @htTweets @VinayakD @mullickjamie Congratulations. Ordered. Book on its way. Old rule: never ask the author for a complimentary copy #ToHellAndBack
